p: HCV phylotree was constructed by using MEGA software. The χ 2 test was used to compare the difference between HIV-infected and HIV/HCV co-infected patients. The relationship between HCV genotypes and biochemical features of HCV/HIV co-infected patients was analysed by using the one way analysis of variance test. HIV-viral load was compared between HIV-infected and HIV/HCV co-infected samples by using Student's t test (unpaired, two tailed). Correlation matrix was used to analyse the relationship between biochemical features and HIV-viral load in HIV/HCV co-infected patients. The Mann–Whitney U test was used to calculate the difference of viral load or biochemical features between different age groups (two tailed). The P value less than 0.05 was considered as statistical difference. GraphPad Prism 5 software was used for statistical analysis.
